titles.title: i fix my eyes on you

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
i fix my eyes on you
the author of my faith
casting aside every sin and every weight
i fix my eyes on you, i lay my burdens down
letting the cares of this world now fade away

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
oh, one thing i ask, this one i seek
that i may dwell in your house
oh, lord my King
all the days of my life
i want to gaze into your beauty
and seek you in the holy place
